
0.0.6 / 2012-10-08 
==================

  * add `this._callbacks` initialization to prevent funky gotcha

==================

  * fix `Emitter.call(this)` usage

==================

  * add `.listeners()`
  * rename `.has()` to `.hasListeners()`

==================

  * fix `.off()` with `.once()`-registered callbacks
